column3: Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign, scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com

Hi,
Have you plan to add this feature?
Regards,
@klikh - what's the status of this PR? It's almost two years old, and I'm still having issues with the problem this resolves.
Hi, I would like to know status of this PR also.

merged, thanks for the contribution!
ps., sorry for the delay
